pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PHUB - An API wrapper for PornHub.PHUB is an hybrid API for Pornhub. It is able to communicate with Pornhubusing both web-scraping and Pornhub's HubTraffic API. It isable to access most used or useful PH features, such as video searching,accessing account features, video downloading, and a lot more.Learn more on the project [documentation](https://phub.readthedocs.io) and[github page](https://github.com/Egsagon/PHUB).## Installation```shpip install --upgrade phub```## Quickstart```pythonimport phubclient = phub.Client()video = client.get(url = '...')video.download('my-video.mp4', quality = 'best')```
